record.field:
Dear Admin,

% if object.guest_type == 'guest':

Guest house booking request by ${object.requested_by_id.name} for guest.

% endif % if object.guest_type != 'guest':

Guest house booking request by ${object.requested_by_id.name}.

% endif
Guesthouse Guest Type From To Room Type
${object.guest_house_id.guest_house_name} ${object.guest_type} ${object.check_in_date_time.strftime('%d %b %Y %H:%M:%S')} ${object.check_out_date_time.strftime('%d %b %Y %H:%M:%S')} ${object.room_type}

Dear Admin,

% if object.guest_type == 'new_joinee':

Guest house booking request by ${object.requested_by_id.name} for ${object.requesting_for}.

% elif object.guest_type == 'admin':

Guest house booking request by ${object.requested_by_id.name} for ${object.requesting_for_id.name}.

% endif
Guesthouse Guest Type From To Room Type
${object.guest_house_id.guest_house_name} % if object.guest_type == 'new_joinee': new joinee % else: ${object.guest_type} % endif ${object.check_in_date_time.strftime('%d %b %Y %H:%M:%S')} ${object.check_out_date_time.strftime('%d %b %Y %H:%M:%S')} ${object.room_type}
Mail template for applying guesthouse for Admin

Dear ${object.requested_by_id.name},

% if object.guest_type == 'guest':

Guest house booking request for guest has been approved.

% endif % if object.guest_type != 'guest':

Guest house booking request has been approved.

% endif % if object.room_type != 'single': % endif % if object.room_type != 'single': % endif
Guesthouse Guest Type From To Room TypeBooking TypeRoom No
${object.guest_house_id.guest_house_name} ${object.guest_type} ${object.check_in_date_time.strftime('%d %b %Y %H:%M:%S')} ${object.check_out_date_time.strftime('%d %b %Y %H:%M:%S')} ${object.room_type} % if object.booking_type == 'partially_book': partially book % elif object.booking_type == 'fully_book': fully book % else: ${object.booking_type} % endif ${object.room_id.room_name}

Mail template for guesthouse room check out
Guest House Room Check Out Process

Dear ${object.requested_by_id.name},

kindly clear Room No ${object.room_id.room_name}, which is booked for ${object.requesting_for} (New Joinee), by ${object.check_out_date_time.strftime('%d %b %Y %H:%M:%S')}, coordinating with guest house management for a smooth check-out process.
